root.name: Luxor Evolved
root.description: OverviewAs the successor of Luxor continues the gameplay that is so characteristic of the series but does it faster and in a modern style. As before, the game is all about shooting away balls at the right moment with the right color. The game features 65 levels to conquer, 4 game modes and 24 power-ups.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7Processor: 1 GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: 128MBDirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive: 100 MB HD space
